data.title: The Crossing at Auburn Hills - 601 Seville Blvd Pontiac MI
data.meta_description: The most trafficked website about home sales and rentals, with real estate values for almost every U.S. home. 1,000,000 listings that you won't find on MLS.
data.text:
Welcome to The Crossing at Auburn Hills, a residential community featuring Two and Three bedroom apartment homes. Currently under Renovations. Spacious layouts and amenities welcome you home, along with EXCEPTIONAL service and an ideal location within walking distance to shopping, dining and entertainment options. Contact our friendly, professional office staff to come by for a visit today.

What is the walk score of The Crossing at Auburn Hills?

The Crossing at Auburn Hills has a walk score of 17, it's car-dependent.

What schools are assigned to The Crossing at Auburn Hills?

The schools assigned to The Crossing at Auburn Hills include Owen Elementary School, Alcott School, and Hazel Park Training Facility Ii.

Does The Crossing at Auburn Hills have in-unit laundry?

Yes, The Crossing at Auburn Hills has in-unit laundry for some or all of the units.

What neighborhood is The Crossing at Auburn Hills in?

The Crossing at Auburn Hills is in the 48340 neighborhood in Pontiac, MI.

What are The Crossing at Auburn Hills's policies on pets?

To have a cat at The Crossing at Auburn Hills there is a required deposit of $200. This building has monthly fee of $25 for cats. To have a dog at The Crossing at Auburn Hills there is a required deposit of $200. This building has monthly fee of $25 for dogs.
